panel.label: General
panel.name: general_tab
panel.panel.string:
The General tab contains general information about this group, a list of members, general Group Preferences and member options.
Hover your mouse over the options for more help.

combo_box.name: active_title
combo_box.tool_tip: Sets the title that appears in your avatar's name tag when this group is active.

check_box.label: Receive group notices
check_box.name: receive_notices
check_box.tool_tip: Sets whether you want to receive Notices from this group. Uncheck this box if this group is spamming you.

check_box.label: Receive group instant messages
check_box.name: receive_chat
check_box.tool_tip: Sets whether you want to participate in group chat for this group.

check_box.label: Show in my profile
check_box.name: list_groups_in_profile
check_box.tool_tip: Sets whether you want to show this group in your profile

check_box.label: Anyone can join
check_box.name: open_enrollement
check_box.tool_tip: Sets whether this group allows new members to join without being invited.

check_box.label: Cost to join
check_box.name: check_enrollment_fee
check_box.tool_tip: Sets whether to require an enrollment fee to join the group

spinner.label: L$
spinner.name: spin_enrollment_fee
spinner.tool_tip: New members must pay this fee to join the group when Enrollment Fee is checked.

combo_box.name: group_mature_check
combo_box.tool_tip: Maturity ratings designate the type of content and behavior allowed in a group

check_box.name: show_in_group_list
check_box.tool_tip: Let people see this group in search results
